TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QueryStringParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 将 HTTP 请求查询字符串字段的值绑定到参数对象。

span.span: Binds the value of an HTTP request query-string field to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用类以将绑定传递作为 HTTP 请求查询字符串的一部分到参数使用参数化的查询或命令中的字段的值。You can use the class to bind the value of a field that is passed as part of an HTTP request query string to a parameter that is used in a parameterized query or command. 从检索字段集合。The field is retrieved from the collection. 将数据绑定到参数的控件可能会引发异常，如果引用对象，但传递没有相应的查询字符串名称/值对。Controls that bind data to the parameter might throw an exception if a object is referenced, but no corresponding query-string name/value pair is passed. 同样，它们可能会显示任何数据，如果没有对应的值传递的查询字符串字段名称。Similarly, they might display no data if the query-string field name is passed without a corresponding value. 若要避免这些情况下，设置属性在适当的位置。To avoid these situations, set the property where appropriate. 类提供属性，它标识要绑定到的查询字符串值的名称。The class provides the property, which identifies the name of the query string value to bind to. 它还提供了从继承的属性类。It also provides the properties that are inherited from the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类不会验证传递的值; 它提供的原始值。The class does not validate the value that is passed; it provides the raw value. 但是，可以验证的值数据源控件中的对象。However, you can validate the value of a object in a data source control. 为此，请处理`Selecting`， `Updating`， `Inserting`，或`Deleting`事件的数据源控件，并检查事件处理程序中的参数值。To do so, handle the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event of the data source control and check the parameter value in the event handler. 如果参数的值未通过验证测试，则可以通过设置取消数据操作属性关联的类到`true`。If the value of the parameter does not pass the validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建对象显示中的数据时要用作筛选器控件。The following example shows how to create a object to use as a filter when you display data in a control. 你添加对象传递给控件的集合。You add the object to the control's collection. 参数对象将名为的查询字符串字段的值绑定`country`到其字符串。The parameter object binds the value of the query-string field named `country` to its string. 因为没有属性指定参数，如果没有字段名为`country`与查询字符串中，一起传递控件将引发异常。Because no property is specified for the parameter, if no field named `country` is passed with the query string, the control throws a exception. 如果字段名为`country`传递但没有值，控件显示任何数据。If a field named `country` is passed but has no value, the control displays no data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4/CS/qsp4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4/VB/qsp4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建要使用参数化的 SQL 查询显示从 Access 数据库的数据对象。The following example shows how to create a object to display data from an Access database by using a parameterized SQL query. 对象检索然后中显示的记录控件。The object retrieves records that are then displayed in a control. 控件也是可编辑，并允许用户更新的 Northwind Traders Orders 表中的订单的状态。The control is also editable, and lets users update the status of orders in the Northwind Traders Orders table. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/CS/sql22cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/VB/sql22vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的未命名新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new unnamed instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A通过创建的对象构造函数初始化与所有其属性的默认值。A object that is created by using the constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties. 属性初始化，如下所示：The properties are initialized as follows: - 初始化为空字符串 ("")。 is initialized to an empty string (""). - 初始化为空字符串 ("")。 is initialized to an empty string (""). - 初始化为 。 is initialized to . - 初始化为 。 is initialized to . - 初始化为 `null`。 is initialized to `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用构造函数来创建一个新参数并将其添加到集合控件。The following example shows how to use the constructor to create a new parameter and add it to the collection of an control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/CS/querystrparam1cs.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/VB/querystrparam1vb.aspx.vb#2)] 对象添加到控制，在 ASP.NET 网页中声明。The object is added to the control and is declared in an ASP.NET Web page. 控件使用控件将绑定并使用查询字符串，其中包含名为字段请求页时显示数据`empId`且相应的值。The control uses the control to bind and display data whenever the page is requested with a query string that contains a field that is named `empId` and that has a corresponding value. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/CS/querystrparam1cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/VB/querystrparam1vb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是用于克隆的受保护的复制构造函数实例。The constructor is a protected copy constructor that is used to clone a instance. 值， ，和属性传输到新实例。The values of the , , and properties are transferred to the new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A通过创建的对象构造函数初始化与指定的参数名称用于标识该参数绑定到的查询字符串字段。A object that is created by using the constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name that identifies the query-string field that the parameter binds to. 和使用默认值初始化属性。The and properties are initialized with default values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建两个通过使用对象构造函数将它们添加到控件的集合。The following example shows how to create two objects by using the constructor and add them to an control's collection. A控件显示数据，如果`employee`和`country`与请求传递查询字符串字段和如果它们具有有效的值。A control displays data if the `employee` and `country` query-string fields are passed with the request and if they have valid values. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2/CS/qsp2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2/VB/qsp2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A通过创建的对象构造函数初始化使用指定的参数名称、 参数类型和一个字符串，标识该参数绑定到的查询字符串字段。A object that is created by using the constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name, the parameter type, and a string that identifies the query-string field that the parameter binds to. 和使用默认值初始化属性。The and properties are initialized with default values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建通过使用对象构造函数将其添加到控件的集合。The following example shows how to create a object by using the constructor and add it to an control's collection. A控件显示数据，如果`employee`和`country`与请求传递查询字符串字段和如果它们具有有效的值。A control displays data if the `employee` and `country` query-string fields are passed with the request and if they have valid values. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3/CS/qsp3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3/VB/qsp3vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The current instance of the request.

param.name: control
param.span: 与使用 对象的 ASP.NET 网页关联的 Web 服务器控件。

span.span: A Web server control that is associated with the ASP.NET Web page where the object is used.
**Note** This parameter is not used.

summary.span: 更新并返回 对象的值。

span.span: Updates and returns the value of the object.

returns.span: 表示参数当前值的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the current value of the parameter.

returns.span: 如果上下文或请求为 ， 方法将返回 。

span.span: If the context or the request is , the method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象尝试将每个时间绑定到查询字符串字段，调用方法。The object tries to bind to the query-string field every time that the method is called. `context`参数由方法来检索查询字符串中指定的查询字符串字段的值。The `context` parameter is used by the method to retrieve the value of the specified query-string field from the query string. `control`参数将被忽略。The `control` parameter is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public string QueryStringField { get; set; }
.property instance string QueryStringField
Public Property QueryStringField As String
public: property System::String ^ QueryStringField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置参数所绑定的查询字符串字段的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the query-string field that the parameter binds to.

value.span: 参数所绑定的查询字符串字段的名称。

span.span: The name of the query-string field that the parameter binds to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识与查询字符串一起传递的名称/值对。The property identifies a name/value pair that is passed with the query string. 属性标识的名称对，而属性在运行时绑定到其对应的值。The property identifies the name of the pair, whereas the property binds to its corresponding value at run time. 如果预期的查询字符串名称/值对未传递给查询字符串的页方法然后尝试将参数绑定到的值属性。If the expected query-string name/value pair is not passed to the page with the query string, the method then tries to bind the parameter to the value of the property. 如果未设置属性，方法无法将参数绑定到一个值。If the property is not set, the method fails to bind the parameter to a value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象连同控件来显示中的数据控件。The following example shows how to use a object together with a control to display data in a control. 属性设置为预期的查询字符串字段的名称和参数添加到集合。The property is set to the name of the expected query-string field, and the parameter is added to the collection. A提供属性是名称/值对不传递与查询字符串的情况下。A property is provided in case the name/value pair is not passed with the query string. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/CS/querystrparam1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/VB/querystrparam1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用对象连同控件来显示中的数据控件。The following example shows how to use a object together with a control to display data in a control. 对象添加到集合，以及其他用于输出参数和返回值的参数对象。The object is added to the collection, together with other parameter objects that are used for the output parameter and return value. 若要检索数据，处理从存储过程返回的值。To retrieve data, handle the values that are returned from the stored procedure. 此代码示例是一个更大的示例为提供的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/CS/sql21cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/VB/sql21vb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ValidateInput { get; set; }
.property instance bool ValidateInput
Public Property ValidateInput As Boolean
public: property bool ValidateInput { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置是否验证查询字符串参数的值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the value of the query string parameter is being validated or not.

value.span: 如果查询参数的值有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value of the query parameter is being validated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果页属性设置为`true`，和属性设置为`false`，将不会验证查询字符串参数。If the page property is set to `true`, and the property is set to `false`, the query string parameter will not be validated. 但是，如果页属性设置为`true`，和属性设置为`true`，将验证查询字符串参数。However, if the page property is set to `true`, and the property is set to `true`, the query string parameter will be validated. 如果页属性设置为`false`，而不管是否将验证查询字符串参数属性设置为`true`或`false`。If the page property is set to `false`, the query string parameter will be validated regardless of whether the property is set to `true` or `false`.
